name: Zucchini Carrot Patties with Bacon
author: Beth Smith
summary: Delicious gluten-free, paleo-friendly zucchini cakes! Bacon and onions take this savory side to another level.
directions: Sprinkle zucchini and carrot with salt and drain in a colander
Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels
Cook and stir onions in the same skillet over medium heat until translucent, about 5 minutes
Rinse zucchini and carrot; remove excess liquid by squeezing through cheese cloth or paper towels
Place zucchini, carrot, bacon, egg, onion, almond flour, garlic, and Italian seasoning in a large bowl
Form a 1/2-inch thick patty using 1/4 cup of the mixture
Heat coconut oil over medium-high heat and cook patties until browned, about 4 minutes per side
